item.title: Retro Vulnlab
item.description: TLDR NmapðŸ”— SMB enumðŸ”— Users dumpðŸ”—\ In this post we will learn ADCS attack (ESC4) and pre-created computer accounts. Nmap Using nmap we can scan the machine to understand which ports/services are open nmap -sC -sV -T4 -oN nmap.txt 10.10.81.246 After getting results we can see ports/services on the host Starting Nmap 7.94SVN ( https://nmap.org ) at 2024-10-23 13:09 EDT Nmap scan report for 10.10.81.246 Host is up (0.10s latency). Not shown: 988 filtered tcp ports (no-response) PORT STATE SERVICE VERSION 53/tcp open domain Simple DNS Plus 88/tcp open kerberos-sec Microsoft Windows Kerberos (server time: 2024-10-23 17:09:57Z) 135/tcp open msrpc Microsoft Windows RPC 139/tcp open netbios-ssn Microsoft Windows netbios-ssn 389/tcp open ldap Microsoft Windows Active Directory LDAP (Domain: retro.
